description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Disaster Risk Reduction, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Evaluation And Research, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The country programme is effectively designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality standards in achieving results for children.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERE DES FINANCES ET COOPERATION AU DEVELOPPEMENT ECONOMIQUE
UNIVERSITY OF WITWATERSRAND SCHOOL OF PUBLIC HEALTH

sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Risk management and resilience/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data
Violence, exploitation, and abuse - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

title.narrative: Burundi United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Evaluation Formative De La Reforme Del'enseignement Fondamental Au Burundi 2013 a 2020
Burundi 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The Burundi country office implemented new procedures aligned with the Eastern and Southern Africa Regional Office's Evaluation Framework and the revised evaluation policy to improve the quality and use of two ongoing evaluations and the design and planning of three additional ones. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/12/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of evaluation that obtain at least satisfactory rating by GEROS
